name: Goatfloyd is Here
description:
A couple of weird aliens star in a low-budget adventure.

Goatfloyd is Here is one of those point n' click survival "horror" games, inspired by the likes of Five Nights at Freddy's and more recently, Baldi's Basics. If you're familiar with The Goatfloyd Corneb and its particular style you'll know what to expect. If you're not familiar, well, [CLICK HERE] to familiarise your dang self with it.

As for the game itself, PRINT PAGES! Commit POLITICAL ESPIONAGE! Cook BURGERS! Get lost in a labyrinth of sights and sounds unlike any you've seen before!

#Avoidthefloyd

This game was made in 10 days when I had a really bad sunburn and nothing better to do, mostly as a joke.
